from pathlib import Path
import yaml

BASE_DIR = Path\(''D:/Code/gemini/feather_trace''\)
config_path = BASE_DIR / ''config/settings.yaml''

with open\(config_path, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    config = yaml.safe_load\(f\)

processed_dir = \(BASE_DIR / config[''paths''][''output''][''root_dir'']\).resolve\(\)
print\(f''processed_dir: {processed_dir}''\)

# 数据库中的相对路径
file_path = ''data\\processed\\\\20260123北京小漕村附近\\\\DDY08510_1_黑鹳_93pct.jpg''
print\(f''db path: {file_path}''\)

abs_path = Path\(file_path\).resolve\(\)

print\(f''resolved exists: {abs_path.exists\(\)}''\)
print\(f''processed_dir in parents: {processed_dir in abs_path.parents}''\)
